description.en_US: Shoot a gust of frozen wind to freeze your enemies.
Bring forth the wrath of the true power of ice by summoning snowflakes to decimate your enemies.
Summon a bolt of lightning to strike a single enemy.
Summon forth a sphere of lightning that electrocutes nearby foes.
Shoot a ball of lightning that attacks many foes.
Summons an aura to zap nearby foes..
Barrage baddies with a big bubble bonanza.
Suck in enemies to then blast them away.
Summon a tornado to decimate your foes.
Summon an aura that will periodically damage nearby foes.
